name: Lightdash
title: lightdash.com
payoff: Self-serve BI to 10x your data team
shortDescription: Lightdash transforms your dbt projects into a comprehensive BI platform, aimed at enhancing data team productivity. It integrates software engineering best practices like CI/CD and developer previews into data analytics. Users can define metrics, explore data without SQL, and share insights seamlessly. An AI analyst feature assists in self-serving data needs, making it ideal for teams looking to democratize data access and insights.
pros: Unlimited users and roles, no license worries
Integrates with existing tools and workflows
cons: Potentially steep learning curve for non-developers
Dependent on the robustness of dbt projects

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Tableau
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Widely used for interactive data viz
